about.introduction: I'm a dedicated software engineer with over 5 years of experience in developing web applications and scalable backend services. My journey in software development began when I was in college, building small projects that eventually grew into a passion for creating robust, user-friendly applications.
about.education: I hold a Master's degree in Computer Science from Tech University, where I specialized in distributed systems and cloud computing. This educational background, combined with my professional experience, has equipped me with a strong foundation in both theoretical concepts and practical application development.
about.interests: When I'm not coding, you can find me hiking in the mountains, reading about new technologies, or contributing to open-source projects. I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest trends in the tech industry.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.description: Led the development of a microservices architecture that improved system reliability by 40%.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained multiple client websites and web applications using React and Node.js.

experience.title: Junior Developer
experience.description: Started as an intern and grew into a full-time role, working on frontend development with JavaScript and CSS.

highlights.description: Recognized for developing an innovative AI-powered code review assistant that increased team productivity by 30%.

highlights.description: Received honors for thesis on 'Scalable Architectures for Real-time Data Processing'.
